text: Lion Airlines Flight 610 was a scheduled domestic passenger flight operated by Lion Air from Soekarnoâ€“Hatta International Airport in Jakarta to Depati Amir Airport in Pangkal Pinang. It crashed shortly after takeoff on 29 October 2018. Wreckage from the aircraft was found offshore from the island of Java. All 189 people aboard died. According to The Straits Times, 181 passengers, including 178 adults and three children, were on board the aircraft, as well as six cabin crew and two pilots. title: Lion Air Flight 610
